svg.title: AI-Powered Test Case Creation Engine - Intelligent Test Generator
svg.desc: Comprehensive test case generation system with requirement analysis, automated scenario creation, edge case detection, test optimization, and coverage validation for intelligent testing workflows
svg.text: Intelligent Test Generator - Automated Comprehensive Test Suite Creation

g.text: "Users should be able to login with email and password, with validation
for email format, password strength, and account lockout after 3 failed
attempts. Support password reset via email link with 15-minute expiry."
Password reset with email link (15min expiry)
Testable Conditions: 12 identified | Complexity: Medium | Priority: High
Risk Areas: Authentication, Security, Session Management
TC001: Successful login with valid email/password
Given: Valid user credentials | When: Login attempt | Then: Redirect to dashboard
Given: Valid email | When: Reset request | Then: Email sent, link works
Given: Invalid email format | When: Login attempt | Then: Validation error
TC004: Account lockout after 3 failed attempts
Given: 2 failed attempts | When: 3rd failure | Then: Account locked
Email length: 0 chars, 1 char, 254 chars, 255+ chars
Risk: Buffer overflow, validation bypass | Priority: Critical
Password attempts: exactly 3, rapid succession, concurrent sessions
Risk: Race conditions, lockout bypass | Priority: Critical
Risk: Token timing attacks | Priority: High
Session timeout: user active at boundary, multiple tabs
Risk: Session hijacking, inconsistent state | Priority: High
Concurrent login attempts, password change during login
Risk: Data corruption, inconsistent state | Priority: Medium
Critical Boundaries: 8 identified | Medium Risk: 5 | High Risk: 6
Additional Test Cases: 15 generated | Edge Case Coverage: 87%
Recommended Focus: Input validation, timing attacks, concurrency
Intelligent Test Suite Optimization (38% execution time reduction)
Independent tests: 42 cases | Parallel execution groups: 6 | Estimated speedup: 65%
Dependencies identified: 6 sequential chains | Execution time: 12min ‚Üí 4.2min
Critical path tests: 12 (run first) | High-risk scenarios: 18 | Smoke tests: 8
Failure prediction: 85% accuracy | Early detection: 92% of critical defects
CPU-intensive tests: 8 cases | Memory usage optimization: 45% reduction
Network calls minimized: 23 ‚Üí 8 | Test data optimization: Shared fixtures
Requirements covered: 47/50 | Missing: Password complexity rules, social login, 2FA
Execution paths: 156/180 | Critical paths: 100% | Edge cases: 89%
Input boundaries: 24/26 | State transitions: 18/19 | Error conditions: 15/16
API endpoints: 22/25 | Database operations: 14/15 | External services: 8/10

div.style: position: absolute; left: -10000px; top: auto; width: 1px; height: 1px; overflow: hidden;
div.div: Natural language requirement processing system extracting testable conditions with confidence scoring and complexity analysis
Automated test scenario generation creating comprehensive test cases with happy path, error path, and edge case coverage
Boundary condition and edge case detection system identifying critical testing boundaries with risk assessment
Test suite optimization engine improving execution performance through parallelization, prioritization, and resource allocation
Comprehensive coverage validation system ensuring test adequacy with functional, path, boundary, and integration analysis
